scripts.jsBuild: babel src/js/* -d public/assets/js/ && terser-folder public/assets/js/ -eo public/assets/js/ -x .js
scripts.imgBuild: mkdir public/assets/img & rm -rfv public/assets/img/* & sharp -i "./src/img/**/*.{jpg,png}" -f webp resize 1920 1920 --fit inside --withoutEnlargement  -o public/assets/img
scripts.svgBuild: touch src/svg/empty.svg && svgo -f src/svg/ -o public/assets/svg/ && rm src/svg/empty.svg && rm public/assets/svg/empty.svg
scripts.start: concurrently "nodemon server/server" "npm run browserSync" "npm run cssWatch" "npm run jsWatch"
scripts.build: npm run cssBuild && npm run jsBuild && npm run imgBuild && npm run svgBuild
